value: The team has barged into the main city hall as Annet meets them there.
Can't say I expected to see you still alive.
I knew you were a one kind of a bitch after learning your history with Erika.
But must say, this is a whole different level.
I'm glad you appreciate my work.
I'm glad we are finally past the acting stage and I don't have to deal with their stupidity.
Won't deny it, I did have my fun a couple of times though.
But it was taking too much time.
Whatever, let's just beat the shit out of her.
Tsk, you are throwing away the few minutes of life I am gifting you.
And with such bad manners too.
I'll take care of your friends, once you die, Arron.
